sentences: Ta oli oma tulevikku teistsugusena ette kujutanud.
Püüan ette kujutada, kuidas kõik oli.
context: The word 'kujutan' is the first person singular present indicative form of the Estonian verb 'kujutama'. It means 'I imagine', 'I picture', or 'I visualize'. The word often appears in phrases like 'ette kujutama' (to imagine/picture something). This verb is used when forming mental images or concepts about something that might happen or has happened.
